definitions.text: a single serving of a beverage
examples: I asked for a hot drink

definitions.text: the act of drinking alcoholic beverages to excess

examples: may I take your beverage order?

definitions.text: any large deep body of water
examples: he jumped into the drink and had to be rescued
one swallow of the liquid was enough
he took a drink of his beer and smacked his lips
The patient must drink several liters each day
The children like to drink soda
We were up drinking all night
Let us toast the birthday girl!
Let's drink to the New Year

definitions.text: be fascinated or spell-bound by; pay close attention to
examples: The mother drinks in every word of her son on the stage

definitions.text: drink excessive amounts of alcohol; be an alcoholic
examples: The husband drinks and beats his wife
